name: Fish Tycoon
description: Fish Tycoon is a virtual fish breeding game. The object is to breed and cross breed fish until you find the 7 Magic Fish and solve the genetic puzzle. You will have to buy supplies like meds, eggs and special plants and then sell some of your fish in your virtual pet store.
minimum_requirements: Supported OS: Windows 2000/XP/VistaProcessor: Pentium III 500Memory: 96 MB Graphics: 16MB of VRAMDirectX Version: DirectX 7.0 or laterHard Drive: 200 MB

reviews.review_text: I remember playing this when I was 6 or so. This game was my entire childhood. I remember the first game I made, I over fed my fish. This game is the best. Its exactly the way I rememeer it. Im happy I convinced my mom to buy it for me. Very worth it!
Got it on sale for $1. Worth every penny...all 100 of them.
